articles.title: India vs Pakistan: The only Asia Cup Super Four game with a reserve day - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: This is a change from the earlier playing conditions, which had a reserve day only for the final on September 17
articles.content: NewsThis is a change from the earlier playing conditions, which had a reserve day only for the final on September 17

articles.title: Asia markets fall as Japan economy grows slower than expected; Hong Kong cancels Friday trading - CNBC
articles.description: Hong Kong's exchange cancelled trading for the day following a "black rainstorm" warning.

articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: What is ‘Hero Kim Kun Ok’, North Korea's new nuclear submarine to counter US naval power | Mint - Mint
articles.description: North Korea launches nuclear attack submarine to counter US and its Asian allies, says Kim Jong Un.
articles.content: In a bid to counter growing dominance of the US and Asian allies, North Korea launched its new purported nuclear attack submarine, reported North Korea's official Korean Central News Agency on Friday.
